review.title: “Will work here any day!”
review.pros: Pros – I have been working with USTS for a long time. I still work here. We have a product the is being developed and I am part owner of the product, in other words, when the product sells, I will get residual income whether I work for USTS or not. Also, I received interest free loans when I needed help the most - to get my sister married. I cannot forget what they did for me. Salary is paid on the first of every month. Never a delay and they pay well, including lakh & over in bonuses.
review.cons: Cons – Long hours, yes. But if i or any one in my family have a medical emergency or any issues atall, this company has always let me work from home. Given me extra money if my medical bills are more than what I can manage. They have been very fair. If you think of this company as your own and put in your 100% work, this is a great company to work with.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
